Method Detail

generateString

public static String generateString(ModifiedUTF8.Acceptor acceptor)
                             throws IOException
Generates a string encoded in Modifed UTF-8. The byte length is going to be randomly choosen between 0(inclusive) and 65536(exclusive).

Parameters:
acceptor - a character acceptor.
Returns:
a randomly generated string.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
See Also:
generateString(int, jinahya.util.ModifiedUTF8.Acceptor)

Generates a string encoded in Modified UTF-8.

Parameters:

Parameters:
